sentences.en: Acute respiratory insufficiency in the postoperative patient may be caused by defective ventilation.
sentences.cn: 手术后病人的急性呼吸功能不全,可因不足的通气所引起.

sentences.en: Advanced neck cell carcinoma: preoperative radiotherapy versus postoperative radiotherapy?
sentences.cn: 晚期头颈鳞癌: 术前放疗还是术后放疗?

sentences.en: All cases were confirmed as RMAL by postoperative pathology.
sentences.cn: 所有手术病例,术后病理学诊断均为肾错构瘤.

sentences.en: Bethanechol is of value in certain cases of postoperative abdominal distention and gastric atony or stasis.
sentences.cn: 氨甲酰甲胆碱对于术后腹胀和胃张力缺乏或停滞的某些病例有效.

sentences.en: Combined analgesics for postoperative pain therapy: Review of effectivity and side - effects.
sentences.cn: 联合镇痛药在术后疼痛治疗中的应用: 疗效和副作用的综述.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Fibrin sealant occlusion method is effective for the postoperative enterocutaneous fistula.
sentences.cn: 结论: 纤维蛋白胶能有效地促进肠外瘘愈合.

sentences.en: Every one dog was executed at postoperative 1,2 and 3 months.
sentences.cn: 分别于术后1,2,3个月各处死实验犬1只,取出新生食管.

sentences.en: Functional training is of great importance to the postoperative walking ability.
sentences.cn: 功能训练对术后功能有重要意义.

sentences.en: Hiccups can be very annoying in the postoperative period.
sentences.cn: 呃逆在术后期间很令人烦恼.

sentences.en: Objective : To discuss effect of nurse intervention upon postoperative complications diabetic cataract.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨护理干预对糖尿病性白内障术后并发症的影响.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the pathogenesis of the postoperative pancreatitis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨手术后胰腺炎的病理变化及其发生机制.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the reasons of the second cholesteatoma of postoperative tympanoplasty.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨单纯鼓室成形术后发生胆脂瘤的原因并提出预防措施.

sentences.en: Preoperative and postoperative wavefront analysis was performed with a Tscherning aberrometer.
sentences.cn: 手术前和手术后均使用Tscherning像差计测量,分析波前像差.

sentences.en: Purpose : Cell - mediated immunity ( CMI ) is believed to influence postoperative tumor growth and inflammatory response.
sentences.cn: 细胞免疫在机体抗肿瘤和抗感染反应中起着关键的作用.

sentences.en: The patient received excision biopsy and had an uneventful postoperative course.
sentences.cn: 因本病例特别罕见,特提出报告并回顾文献加以讨论.

trans.tran_en: Postoperative means occurring after and relating to a medical operation
